nodes.text: Bandigos (also called Bandingos) were a species of vicious omnivore commonly found within Sriluur's Temptation Canyon. They resembled large, dog-like creatures with four clawed-legs and wrinkled skin. They were widely known for their long, sinister howls—which many Weequay falsely believed to be produced by Water Nymphs living within the canyon.
Bandigos lived in the sand, and often ambushed their prey by hiding under a thin layer of sand until the prey got close enough to capture.
